DESCRIPTOR.LABEL: ENA sewage checklist
DESCRIPTOR.NAME: ENA sewage checklist
DESCRIPTOR.DESCRIPTION: Minimum information about sewage samples. A checklist for reporting of sewage surveillance samples associated with sequence data from metagenomic sequencing projects. This minimum metadata standard was developed by the COMPARE platform.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: geography

FIELD.LABEL: name of the sampling site
FIELD.NAME: name of the sampling site
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Refers to the name of the site/station where data/sample collection is performed.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: non-sample terms

FIELD.LABEL: investigation type
FIELD.NAME: investigation type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Nucleic Acid Sequence Report is the root element of all MIxS compliant reports as standardised by Genomic Standards Consortium

FIELD.LABEL: nucleic acid extraction
FIELD.NAME: nucleic acid extraction
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Link to a literature reference, electronic resource or a standard operating procedure (SOP)

FIELD.LABEL: nucleic acid amplification
FIELD.NAME: nucleic acid amplification
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Link to a literature reference, electronic resource or a standard operating procedure (SOP)

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: Collection event information

FIELD.LABEL: collection date
FIELD.NAME: collection date
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The date of sampling, either as an instance (single point in time) or interval. In case no exact time is available, the date/time can be right truncated i.e. all of these are valid ISO8601 compliant times: 2008-01-23T19:23:10+00:00; 2008-01-23T19:23:10; 2008-01-23; 2008-01; 2008.

FIELD.LABEL: geographic location (country and/or sea)
FIELD.NAME: geographic location (country and/or sea)
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The geographical origin of the sample as defined by the country or sea. Country or sea names should be chosen from the INSDC country list (http://insdc.org/country.html).

TEXT_VALUE.VALUE: South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

FIELD.LABEL: geographic location (latitude)
FIELD.NAME: geographic location (latitude)
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The geographical origin of the sample as defined by latitude and longitude. The values should be reported in decimal degrees and in WGS84 system

FIELD.LABEL: geographic location (longitude)
FIELD.NAME: geographic location (longitude)
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The geographical origin of the sample as defined by latitude and longitude. The values should be reported in decimal degrees and in WGS84 system

FIELD.LABEL: geographic location (region and locality)
FIELD.NAME: geographic location (region and locality)
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: The geographical origin of the sample as defined by the specific region name followed by the locality name.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: sample collection

FIELD.LABEL: amount or size of sample collected
FIELD.NAME: amount or size of sample collected
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Amount or size of sample (volume, mass or area) that was collected

FIELD.LABEL: sample storage duration
FIELD.NAME: sample storage duration
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: duration for which sample was stored

FIELD.LABEL: sample storage temperature
FIELD.NAME: sample storage temperature
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: temperature at which sample was stored, e.g. -80

FIELD.LABEL: sample storage location
FIELD.NAME: sample storage location
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: location at which sample was stored, usually name of a specific freezer/room

FIELD.LABEL: sample transportation temperature
FIELD.NAME: sample transportation temperature
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: transportation temperature from sample site to storage

FIELD.LABEL: sample transportation date
FIELD.NAME: sample transportation date
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: transportation/shipping date of the sample. Format:YYYY-MM-DD

FIELD.LABEL: sample transportation time
FIELD.NAME: sample transportation time
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: transportation time from sample site to storage

FIELD.LABEL: receipt date
FIELD.NAME: receipt date
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Date on which the sample was received. Format:YYYY-MM-DD. Please provide the highest precision possible. If the sample was received by the institution and not collected, the 'receipt date' must be provided instead. Either the 'collection date' or 'receipt date' must be provided. If available, provide both dates.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: local environment conditions

FIELD.LABEL: sewage type
FIELD.NAME: sewage type
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Type of sewage based on origin: wastewater treatment plant (municipal or industrial), open sewer line, river, stream, stagnant pool, or other.

FIELD.LABEL: temperature
FIELD.NAME: temperature
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: temperature of the sample at time of sampling

FIELD.LABEL: area of sampling site
FIELD.NAME: area of sampling site
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Please indicate if there are specific facilities in the area covered by the sewage sample. For example: farming, slaughterhouse(s), industry, hospital(s) or any other facility.

FIELD_GROUP.restrictionType: Any number or none of the fields
FIELD_GROUP.NAME: demography

FIELD.LABEL: size of the catchment area
FIELD.NAME: size of the catchment area
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Refers to the size of the area that is drained by the sampled sewage system in square km.

FIELD.LABEL: population size of the catchment area
FIELD.NAME: population size of the catchment area
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Refers to the number of people living in the area covered by the sewage system.
